title: Global Education Communities Corp. Reports Director Election Results

title: The Race Trump Can’t Disappear Behind
description: But as Trump has moved closer to becoming the Republican nominee, such a cushion has become harder to maintain. There is barely a primary race for him to disappear behind. And as the race shifts to a new phase, he is creating hurdles his allies wish he would avoid.

title: Trump calls on Alabama to protect availability of IVF treatment
description: Donald Trump has said he supports the availability of IVF treatment, joining a growing number of Republicans seeking to distance themselves from an Alabama court ruling on the issue. The state's top court ruled last week that frozen embryos have the same legal rights as children.

title: MP to retire after 41 years in politics

title: Hawaii voting FAQ
description: Hawaii is among eight states nationwide with universal mail-in voting . Every registered voter will receive a mail ballot at least 18 days before the state primary and general election.
